niku: So I select gnome-core then spin them in as needed or required?
gnome-core gdm x11-xserver-utils
Then you add what you want, themes and applications.

The same idea can be applied for just about anything. I wanted a media center and nothing else. So I start off with few essential packages then xbmc (popular media center). Eventually I add samba and cups (for printer sharing). Kinda making it my home server + media center. :)
